statement.p: Consider the note D4 which has frequency 311.127 Hz.
What is the period for D4?
What is the wavelength for D4?
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{311.127}}\approx{0.0032141215645058}\approx{0.00321412}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{311.127}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{3.5869596659885}\approx{3.587}.
